title: Status Effects
content: zy. -1 to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws, and most Ability Checks. Braced Spend 6m of your movement speed. For the rest of your turn, roll ranged damage twice and use the highest result. Burning Take an additional 1d4 Fire damage per turn for the duration. Buthir's Wrath Buthir is enraged! Strength increased by 4, Armour Class Reduced by 2. Calmed Can't be Charmed or Frightened. Caustic Brine Covered in caustic brine. Takes 1d4 Acid damage per turn. Charmed A Charmed creature can't harm the charmer
